mapper.insert: insert into t_payment_item(id, item_name, reimbursement_cap, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description, field_01, field_02, field_03, field_04, field_05) values ( #{id}, #{itemName}, #{reimbursementCap}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description}, #{field01}, #{field02}, #{field03}, #{field04}, #{field05} )
mapper.update: update t_payment_item set item_name = #{itemName}, reimbursement_cap = #{reimbursementCap}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, description = #{description}, field_01 = #{field01}, field_02 = #{field02}, field_03 = #{field03}, field_04 = #{field04}, field_05 = #{field05}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, item_name as itemName, reimbursement_cap as reimbursementCap, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_payment_item where id = #{id}
select version from t_payment_item where id = #{id}

select id as id, item_name as itemName, reimbursement_cap as reimbursementCap, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_payment_item order by field_01

select id as id, item_name as itemName, reimbursement_cap as reimbursementCap, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_payment_item limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageIndex}
